name: Clockwork Hound
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tripping Tongue
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: The clockwork hound doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Diligent Tracker
special_abilities.desc: The clockwork hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom (Survival) checks that rely on scent or that are made to find a creature.

special_abilities.name: Explosive Core
special_abilities.desc: The mechanism that powers the hound explodes when the Construct is destroyed. Each creature within 5 feet of the hound when it is destroyed must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: The clockwork hound is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The clockwork hound has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
